Model {
  Name			  "sampleModel1"
  System {
    Block {
      BlockType		      Delay
      Name		      "cfblk1"
    }
    Block {
      BlockType		      Delay
      Name		      "cfblk2"
      SID		      "2"
    }
    Line {
      ZOrder		      1
      SrcBlock    "cfblk1"
      DstBlock    "cfblk2"
      DstBlock    "cfblk1"
    }
  }
}
